reqs: For inquiries, please contact the BME Program office - 604-822-0367; gradsec@bme.ubc.ca.
description: Principles and operation of biomedical equipment for cardiovascular system, respiratory system, renal dialysis, endoscopy, surgery, and imaging. Functional relationships of biomedical equipment to physiology and anatomy of major body systems. Restricted to students in EECE and MECH Biomedical Engineering options. Credit will be granted for only one of BMEG 410 or BMEG 510.
